metadata.description: From the small screen to the comic book page, Harley Quinn stars in her own self-titled series! First appearing on "Batman: The Animated Series," the Joker's on-again, off-again girlfriend Harley has taken the comic book world by storm, and now she's looking to cause some chaos all across the DC Universe, from Gotham to Metropolis and beyond!
metadata.name: Harley Quinn
